nodes.label: Digital Platforms & Resources Enablement: Configure and maintain job boards, mentoring platforms, skills assessments, and self-help content; ensure data, privacy, and analytics settings.
Career Education Design: Design employability programs (workshops, micro-courses) covering job search, CVs, interviews, networking, and professional skills; align to discipline needs.
Individual Career Guidance & Advising: Provide 1:1 appointments covering career planning, skills gap analysis, job search strategy, and application reviews; triage to specialist supports as needed.
Academic Planning & Pathway Design: Co-create study plans including course sequencing, load, elective choices, pathways (majors/minors), and expected completion date.
Knowledge Management & Student Communications: Maintain advising knowledge base, FAQs, and proactive communications (alerts, deadlines, how-to guides).
Communications & Content: Plan and deliver newsletters, stories, success profiles, and segment-specific communications across email, web, and social.
Digital Community & Platforms: Operate alumni portals, directories, and social communities; integrate login/identity and analytics; moderate participation.
Editorial Planning & Content Lifecycle: Operate the editorial calendar; brief, produce, review, publish and retire content; maintain source-of-truth facts and FAQs.
Broadcast Communications Execution: Plan and send one-to-many messages (media releases, institution-wide emails/SMS, website announcements, newsletters).
Employer & Industry Engagement: Identify, onboard, and manage relationships with employers and professional bodies; curate opportunities (jobs, internships, mentoring) and labour-market insights.
Outcomes, Reporting & Continuous Improvement: Track participation, satisfaction, skills attainment, and graduate outcomes; run reviews and drive improvements to programs and services.
Data, Consent & Insight Enablement: Maintain a single view of stakeholders across systems; manage consent and preferences; generate insights and propensity models.
Measurement, Insight & Continuous Improvement: Track delivery, engagement, reach, sentiment and response SLAs; run A/B tests; drive improvement backlog.
Experiential Learning Brokerage (Co-curricular): Source and coordinate co-curricular employability experiences (mentoring, volunteering, short projects, hackathons) distinct from for-credit WIL.
Partner/Alliance Governance: Run steering committees, QBRs, and joint reviews; monitor KPIs, risks, and obligations; manage renewals or exit.
Issue, Escalation & Satisfaction Management: Receive, triage, and resolve relationship issues; run surveys/health checks; execute save/retention plays where risk is detected.
Policy Interpretation & Eligibility Guidance: Interpret academic regulations (admission variations, credit/RPL, prerequisites, enrolment rules, progression, assessment) for individual cases.
Chapters, Volunteers & Ambassadors: Establish and support alumni chapters, advisory groups, mentors, and ambassadors; manage onboarding, training, and recognition.
Lifelong Learning & Careers Integration: Coordinate alumni access to short courses, micro-credentials, and career services; broker mentoring and talent pipelines.
Interaction & Engagement Execution: Run meetings, events, communications, campaigns, and joint activities per plan; capture outcomes and next actions.
Workshops & Group Programs Delivery: Schedule, promote, and deliver employability workshops, masterclasses, and cohorts (e.g., leadership, entrepreneurship, presentation skills).
Account & Relationship Assignment: Identify priority accounts/partners and assign accountable owners with clear objectives and coverage models.
Relationship Planning (Account/Partner Plans): Create plans per account/partner detailing goals, stakeholders, engagement cadence, joint initiatives, risks, and measures.
Events & Careers Fairs: Plan and deliver on-campus/virtual fairs and employer showcases; manage exhibitor onboarding, logistics, and post-event follow-up.
Data Acquisition, Consent & Governance: Maintain alumni master data, integrate graduations, capture updates, manage consent/preferences, and ensure data quality.
Services & Benefits Administration: Curate and deliver alumni benefits (library access, discounts, partner offers), and manage eligibility and fulfilment.
Alumni Strategy & Segmentation: Define alumni value proposition, priority segments (year, discipline, geography, career stage), and goals across engagement, advocacy, giving, and lifelong learning.
Events & Reunions: Design, promote, and deliver reunions, anniversaries, lectures, and networking events (in-person and virtual).
Insight, Reporting & Continuous Improvement: Measure engagement, satisfaction, lifecycle value, and campaign/event ROI; gather feedback and drive improvements.
Relationship Performance & Continuous Improvement: Track portfolio KPIs (engagement, satisfaction, value), identify gaps, and drive improvements to plans and processes.
Measurement, Learning & Capability Uplift: Measure participation, diversity, sentiment, influence on decisions, and benefits; capture lessons and uplift skills and tools.
Service Strategy & Operating Model: Define careers service scope, channels (online, drop-in, appointments), SLAs, staffing model, and escalation to academic units and central support.
Conversational & Community Communications: Run two-way channels (contact centre, live chat, social community moderation, forums); respond to questions, triage to owners, and close the loop.
Progression Monitoring & Proactive Outreach: Monitor grades, engagement, at-risk indicators; trigger outreach before census/exams; provide advice on remediation, load changes, or supports.
Advising Intake & Triage: Capture enquiries via web, phone, chat, and walk-in; authenticate students; triage to self-help, generalists, or specialists.
Quality Assurance & Compliance: Audit advice quality, measure SLAs/CSAT, review complaints, and implement corrective actions.
Careers Advice
Academic Advice
Alumni Management
Communications Management
Relationship Management
Engagement Management
